title: Best of The Program | Guests: Josh Rogin & Terri Trobiani
description:
Restaurant owner Terry Trobiani calls in to discuss how his city cited him for flying American flags. Journalist Josh Rogin talks Dr. Fauci’s fall from grace and whether more is being covered up. Glenn and Stu discuss a weird divorce case involving a former Miss Connecticut. Glenn’s charity art event is almost here. How will it compare to Hunter Biden’s exhibit?
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
